system:
note description: "Summary description for {../tracker/messages_access_short.xmlMESSAGES_ACCESS}." author: "Andres Rojas and Victor Vavan"
expanded class interface ../tracker/messages_access_short.xmlMESSAGES_ACCESS
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Constant Messages
f_ok../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_okOk: FalseSTRING_8 = "ok"
f_in_use../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_in_useIn_use: FalseSTRING_8 = "e1: current tracker is in use"
f_non_neg_phase_rad../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_non_neg_phase_radNon_neg_phase_rad: FalseSTRING_8 = "e2: max phase radiation must be non-negative value"
f_non_neg_container_rad../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_non_neg_container_radNon_neg_container_rad: FalseSTRING_8 = "e3: max container radiation must be non-negative value"
f_container_lt_phase../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_container_lt_phaseContainer_lt_phase: FalseSTRING_8 = "e4: max container must not be more than max phase radiation"
f_invalid_name_id../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_invalid_name_idInvalid_name_id: FalseSTRING_8 = "e5: identifiers/names must start with A-Z, a-z or 0..9"
f_phase_id_in_use../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_phase_id_in_usePhase_id_in_use: FalseSTRING_8 = "e6: phase identifier already exists"
f_phase_cap_invalid../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_phase_cap_invalidPhase_cap_invalid: FalseSTRING_8 = "e7: phase capacity must be a positive integer"
f_material_missing../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_material_missingMaterial_missing: FalseSTRING_8 = "e8: there must be at least one expected material for this phase"
f_phase_id_non_existent../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_phase_id_non_existentPhase_id_non_existent: FalseSTRING_8 = "e9: phase identifier not in the system"
f_cont_id_in_tracker../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_id_in_trackerCont_id_in_tracker: FalseSTRING_8 = "e10: this container identifier already in tracker"
f_cont_exceeds_cap../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_exceeds_capCont_exceeds_cap: FalseSTRING_8 = "e11: this container will exceed phase capacity"
f_cont_exceeds_rad../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_exceeds_radCont_exceeds_rad: FalseSTRING_8 = "e12: this container will exceed phase safe radiation"
f_material_unexpected../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_material_unexpectedMaterial_unexpected: FalseSTRING_8 = "e13: phase does not expect this container material"
f_cont_exceeds_rad_cap../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_exceeds_rad_capCont_exceeds_rad_cap: FalseSTRING_8 = "e14: container radiation capacity exceeded"
f_cont_id_not_in_tracker../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_id_not_in_trackerCont_id_not_in_tracker: FalseSTRING_8 = "e15: this container identifier not in tracker"
f_diff_phase_id../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_diff_phase_idDiff_phase_id: FalseSTRING_8 = "e16: source and target phase identifier must be different"
f_cont_id_not_in_source../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_id_not_in_sourceCont_id_not_in_source: FalseSTRING_8 = "e17: this container identifier is not in the source phase"
f_cont_rad_non_negative../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_cont_rad_non_negativeCont_rad_non_negative: FalseSTRING_8 = "e18: this container radiation must not be negative"
f_no_undo../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_no_undoNo_undo: FalseSTRING_8 = "e19: there is no more to undo"
f_no_redo../tracker/messages_access_short.xml#f_no_redoNo_redo: FalseSTRING_8 = "e20: there is no more to redo"
end -- class ../tracker/messages_access_short.xmlMESSAGES_ACCESS
